title: The Stories that Empower Us: A Conversation between Tara Brach and Elizabeth Lesser (2020-11-18)
itunes:title: The Stories that Empower Us: A Conversation between Tara Brach and Elizabeth Lesser
description: The Stories that Empower Us: A Conversation between Tara Brach and Elizabeth Lesser (2020-11-18) - Whether we know it or not, our daily lives take direction from myths and tales that are hundreds, even thousands of years old. During their time together, Tara and Elizabeth will speak about how these origin tales have shaped our psyches and perpetuated the violence and suffering that marks our world. They will then explore how we can create fresh stories that guide our collective awakening to peace, compassion and healing.
